title: To Tree Or Not To Tree
description: A married couple disagrees: when should the Christmas decorations go up? That is the question. Skakespeare.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
content:encoded: A married couple disagrees: when should the Christmas decorations go up? That is the question. Skakespeare.
